Export.Routine:
; Any changes in this Include file demands a "Project Compile All" ; (because constants changes are reflected only with a compile command)
; Global Aliases #define CustomerClassName "AEPCustomer" #define Customer @("^"_$$$CustomerClassName)@ #define CustomersClassName "AEPCustomers" #define Customers @("^"_$$$CustomersClassName)@ #define SupplierClassName "AEPSupplier" #define Supplier @("^"_$$$SupplierClassName)@ #define SuppliersClassName "AEPSuppliers" #define Suppliers @("^"_$$$SuppliersClassName)@ #define ProductClassName "AEPProduct" #define Product @("^"_$$$ProductClassName)@ #define ProductsClassName "AEPProducts" #define Products @("^"_$$$ProductsClassName)@ #define ProductPerSupplierClassName "AEPProductPerSupplier" #define ProductPerSupplier @("^"_$$$ProductPerSupplierClassName)@ #define ProductPerSuppliersClassName "AEPProductPerSuppliers" #define ProductPerSuppliers @("^"_$$$ProductPerSuppliersClassName)@ #define ProductPerLocationClassName "AEPProductPerLocation" #define ProductPerLocation @("^"_$$$ProductPerLocationClassName)@
; Method Aliases
#define getY(%variableName) ##class(AEP.Util.Util).getPublicVariable(%variableName) #define setY(%variableName, %value) ##class(AEP.Util.Util).setPublicVariable(%variableName, %value) #define orderY(%variableName) ##class(AEP.Util.Util).orderPublicVariable(%variableName) ; Job's IDs #define AEPPurchaseRequisitionSend 00001 #define AEPJobTest 09999
; Job's Status #define AEPJobStatusStopped 00 #define AEPJobStatusStarted 01
; Offer's Status #define InConception 01 #define Active 02 #define Inactive 03
; Offer's Modality #define Buy 01 #define Sell 02
; Offer's Type #define InitialOffer 01 #define CounterOffer 02 #define FinalOffer 03 #define ReqToCloseOffer 04 #define CloseOffer 05 #define CancelOffer 06
; Negotiation Modality's Type #define ENegotiation 01 #define ReverseAuction 02
; Offer's Type of Source/Dest #define OwnOffer 01 #define CustomerOffer 02 #define SupplierOffer 03
; Offer's Class Fields #define PosBuyOrSell 01 #define PosTypeOfOffer 02 #define PosTypeOfNegotiation 03 #define PosOfferStatus 04 #define PosEffectiveFrom 05 #define PosEffectiveTo 06 #define PosInResponseToOffer 07 #define PosInitialOffer 08 #define PosIDInTheSource 09 #define PosRemarks 10 #define PosTypeOfSource 11 #define PosOfferedByCustomer 12 #define PosOfferedBySupplier 13 #define PosTypeOfDestination 14 #define PosOfferedToCustomer 15 #define PosOfferedToSupplier 16 #define PosSentDate 17 #define PosDescription 22 #define PosSentDateToOperations 23 #define PosShipVia 24 #define PosPackageAmount 25 #define PosFreightAmount 26 #define PosInsuranceAmount 27 #define PosDistanceAmount 28 #define PosSpecialSurcharge 29 #define PosCalculatePackage 30 #define PosCalculateFreight 31 #define PosCalculateInsurance 32 #define PosCalculateDistance 33 #define PosDistance 34 #define PosTypeOfPacking 35 #define PosFreightConditions 36 #define PosSpecialSurchargeValue 37

; Offer Id for LI price edit box #define IdEditBoxOfferLinesPrice "EDBXPRCOFFERLINES"
; Offer Installment CLASS Fields Numbers - ^AEPOfferInstallment: #define AEPOfferInstClassTerm 01 #define AEPOfferInstClassValue 02
; RGB Colors #define COLORDemandsCell "#D9D9D9" #define COLORBuyerSideCell "#B9B9B9" #define COLORSellerSideCell "#999999" #define COLORNotApprovedPRItems "GRAY" #define COLORNotExpiredNotAttendedPRItems "YELLOW" #define COLORExpiredNotAttendedPRItems "RED" #define COLORAllAttendedPRItems "GREEN"
; Requisition Status #define PRInConception 0 #define PRUnderWorkflow 1 #define NotExpiredNotAttendedPRItems 2 #define ExpiredNotAttendedPRItems 3 #define AllAttendedPRItems 4 #define PRRejected 5
; Requisition Workflow Status #define ReqWFStatusPending 0 #define ReqWFStatusNotApproved 1 #define ReqWFStatusApproved 2

; AEPOffers IDs #define DefaultNewSellerOffer 01

; Customized Pagination ID's ; Obs.: Don't use ID which is an initial part of other ID #define PagIDPurchaseRequisition "AEPBPPURCHASEREQ" #define PagIDPurchaseRequisitionLineInbox "AEPBPPURCHASELNIN" #define PagIDPurchaseRequisitionLineOutbox "AEPBPPURCHASELNOUT" #define PagIDPRLinesRequisitions "AEPBPPRLINESREQ" #define PagIDPRLinesNewOffers "AEPBPPRLINESNO" #define PagIDOfferAnswers "AEPBPOFFERANSWERS" #define PagIDOfferLinesAnswers "AEPBPOFFERLINEANSWERS" #define PagIDOfferBuyerSideEditOffers "AEPBPOFFERBSEO" #define PagIDOfferBuyerSideNegotiations "AEPBPOFFERBSN" #define PagIDOfferBuyerSideOpportunities "AEPBPOFFERBSO" #define PagIDOfferSellerSideNewOffers "AEPBPOFFERSSNO" #define PagIDOfferSellerSideSentOffers "AEPBPOFFERSSSO" #define PagIDOfferSellerSideReceivedOffers "AEPBPOFFERSSRO" #define PagIDOfferLinesBuyerSideCreateOffers "AEPBPOFFRLINESBSCO" #define PagIDOfferLinesBuyerSideEditOffers "AEPBPOFFRLINESBSEO" #define PagIDOfferLinesBuyerSideNegotiations "AEPBPOFFRLINESBSN" #define PagIDOfferLinesBuyerSideOpportunities "AEPBPOFFRLINESBSO" #define PagIDOfferLinesSellerSideNewOffers "AEPBPOFFRLINESSSNO" #define PagIDOfferLinesSellerSideSentOffers "AEPBPOFFRLINESSSSO" #define PagIDOfferLinesSellerSideReceivedOffers "AEPBPOFFRLINESSSRO" #define PagIDOfferLinesBestPrices "AEPOFFRLINESBSTPRCS" #define PagIDOfferLinesCompareDifferences "AEPOFFRLINESCOMPDIFF" #define PagIDNegotiationLinesBuyerSideCreateNegotiation "AEPBPNEGLINESBSCN"
; Specific Form Names That Sort, Filter and Group Offers #define AEPOfferSortFilterGroupBuyerSideEditOffers "AEPOfferSortFilterGroupBuyerSideEditOffers" #define AEPOfferSortFilterGroupBuyerSideNegotiations "AEPOfferSortFilterGroupBuyerSideNegotiations" #define AEPOfferSortFilterGroupBuyerSideOpportunities "AEPOfferSortFilterGroupBuyerSideOpportunities" #define AEPOfferSortFilterGroupSellerSideNewOffers "AEPOfferSortFilterGroupSellerSideNewOffers" #define AEPOfferSortFilterGroupSellerSideSentOffers "AEPOfferSortFilterGroupSellerSideSentOffers" #define AEPOfferSortFilterGroupSellerSideReceivedOffers "AEPOfferSortFilterGroupSellerSideReceivedOffers" #define SorFltIDOfferAnswers "AEPBPOFFRANSWS" #define SorFltIDWorkflowPRSearch "AEPWFPRSEARCH"
; ^AEPPurchaseRequisition fields' positions: #define AEPPurchaseRequisitionCreatedByBuyer 16
; Special Caché Variables / Functions #def1arg getCurrentlyExecutingRoutineName(%1) $ZNAME
; Site Types #define WSOffer 1 #define WSProcurement 2 #define COM 3 #define WSRequisition 4
; AEP DSN Prefix #define AEPOCreateOF "AEPOCreateOF" #define AEPOCreateOFLI "AEPOCreateOFLI" #define AEPOActivateOF "AEPOActivateOF" #define AEPOCreateOFI "AEPOCreateOFI" #define AEPODeleteOF "AEPODeleteOF" #define AEPPChangeRQ "AEPPChangeRQ" #define AEPPCreatePO "AEPPCreatePO" #define AEPPCreateRQ "AEPPCreateRQ" #define AEPPGetNextRQ "AEPPGetNextRQ" #define AEPPKillLineRQ "AEPPKillLineRQ" #define AEPPKillRQ "AEPPKillRQ" #define AEPPUnblockPO "AEPPUnblockPO" #define AEPRCreatePR "AEPRCreatePR"

; Req. WF Document Boxes #define Inbox 1 #define Outbox 2
; Req. WF Document Status #define WFDocStatusPending 0 #define WFDocStatusNotApproved 1 #define WFDocStatusApproved 2
; Req. WF Document Track (Steps) Status #define WFDocTrackStatusWaitingOtherSteps 0 #define WFDocTrackStatusNotRead 1 #define WFDocTrackStatusRead 2 #define WFDocTrackStatusProcessed 3 #define WFDocTrackStatusHeld 4 #define WFDocTrackStatusForwarded 5
; Req. WF Actions Type #define WFDocActionApproved 1 #define WFDocActionRejectKill 2 #define WFDocActionRejectReturn 3 #define WFDocActionForward 4 #define WFDocActionHold 5 #define WFDocActionUnhold 6 #define WFDocActionReturn 7 #define WFDocActionCancelForward 8

; Lot Status #define LotAll 00 #define LotInConception 01 #define LotPublished 02 #define LotReceivingProposals 03 #define LotWaitingToOpenProposals 04 #define LotOpeningProposals 05 #define LotWaitingToStartDPE 06 #define LotRunningDPE 07 #define LotClosed 08 #define LotFinished 09 #define LotSuspended 10 #define LotCancelled 11 #define LotRescheduling 12

#define RAuctionSupplier 00 #define RAuctionBuyer 01
